column5: Well gang, it was a fun 2015. Looking through my footage and hard drives, it appears I headed out on the water over 55 times. Started on Jan 2nd with ice fishing Simcoe lake trout and ended it on Dec 30th searching for Quinte walleye. The first half of the year was definitely nicer to me with great ice fishing and bass fishing. The salmon fishing was somewhat slow for myself but still made out okay. For the bottom half of the year, I didn't head out for steelhead much and walleye trolling was a fail. Here is a video I put together of my year. Enjoy
Wow Kevin!  Looks like you had a fantastic year.  And great job on the video editing as well!  Looks professional.
awsome, thanks for taking the time!
Nice recap  I thought that float was gunna drop... Lol
Thats a great video Kevin. At 4:40,very cool shot from up there. I know those two greasers. LOL Great to meet you that day.

Thanks gents.  Mike,  yeah I was really hoping to catch  the float dropping with a steelhead at the end of it.  Unfortunately,  I only went out a couple times and never got any on tape.   Brian,  I think there was some better shots but got lazy/tired and just used that one. LOL,  who's right beside with those greasers?  Lol.  Likewise,  it was nice to finally meet ya.
Awesome video Kevin! Some great shots and fish there.
Wow, you have some serious talent with video editing  I wonder if IGFA has a category for biggest fish on a barbie rod
Great video , thanks for taking the time and sharing that with us
Thanks again all  Soon it will be time to break out the barbie rod to catch more and bigger fish
